name: Lord Godfrey - Level 1
rules: Level Up: 10 (At the start of the Dungeon turn, before flipping any cards, Level Up Godfrey if any Raiding hero has 10 or more damage.);Flip 1 (At the start of the Dungeon turn, flip one Dungeon card.);Assault 5, Long-Range;Reward: 5 XP

name: Lord Godfrey - Level 2
rules: Level Up: 20 (At the start of the Dungeon turn, before flipping any cards, Level Up Godfrey if any Raiding hero has 20 or more damage.);Flip 2 (At the start of the Dungeon turn, flip two Dungeon cards.);Assault 5, Long-Range;Reward: 5 XP

name: Lord Godfrey - Level 3
rules: Level Up: Dead (At the start of the Dungeon turn, before flipping any cards, Level Up Godfrey if any Raiding hero has been destroyed.);Flip 2 (At the start of the Dungeon turn, flip two Dungeon cards.);Assault 10, Long-Range;Reward: 5 XP

name: Lord Godfrey - Level 4
rules: Flip 3 (At the start of the Dungeon turn, flip three Dungeon cards.);Assault 10, Long-Range;Reward: 5 XP

name: Baron Ashbury
rules: Boss (The Dungeon hero can't be attacked.);Mend Rotten Flesh: When Ashbury attacks, he heals 5 damage from Godfrey.;Reward: 2 XP

name: Baron Silverlaine
rules: Boss (The Dungeon hero can't be attacked.);Summon Worgen Spirit: When Silverlaine attacks, search the Dungeon deck for an ally named Razorclaw the Butcher and put him into play. If Razorclaw is not in the Dungeon deck, search for an ally named Odo the Blindwatcher and put him into play instead.;Reward: 2 XP

name: Commander Springvale
rules: Boss (The Dungeon hero can't be attacked.);Desecration: When Springvale attacks, if the MARKED hero's controller controls no ready resources, Springvale deals 10 shadow damage to the MARKED hero.;Reward: 2 XP

name: Lord Walden
rules: Boss (The Dungeon hero can't be attacked.);Mystery Toxin: When Walden attacks, randomly determine if Walden deals 3 nature damage to each exhausted Raiding ally or Walden deals 3 frost damage to each ready Raiding ally.;Reward: 2 XP
flavour: I can't tell if Arugal was brilliant or simply an imbecile.

name: Bloodfang Berserker
rules: Protector;When this ally enters play, the MARKED hero's controller gains control of him, and flip another Dungeon card.

name: Bloodthirsty Ghoul
rules: When this ally enters play, put all Bloodthirsty Ghouls from the graveyard into play.
flavour: Murder never gets old. - Lord Godfrey

name: Haunting Spirit
rules: Elusive;Level 3+: When this ally enters play, each Raider chooses two allies he control and puts them into their owners' hands.

name: Lupine Spectre
rules: Ferocity;Level 3+: When this ally enters play, exhaust all opposing allies.

name: Mindless Horror
rules: Conspicuous (Any opposing hero or ally may protect against this ally.);Untargetable

name: Odo the Blindwatcher
rules: When this ally enters play, if Godfrey or any Dungeon ally would deal damage this turn, it deals double that much instead.

name: Razorclaw the Butcher
rules: Ferocity, Stealth

name: Spitebone Guardian
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 2 melee damage to the MARKED hero and each ally in his party.;Level 3+: This ally deals 6 melee damage to the MARKED hero and each ally in his party instead.

name: Bleed Them Dry
rules: Attach to the MARKED hero, and Godfrey deals 4 shadow damage to it.;Ongoing: Attached hero can't be healed.

name: Calamity
rules: The Raiders choose three Raiding heroes and/or allies. Godfrey deals 10 shadow damage to each of them.;Level 3+: The Raiders chooses six Raiding heroes and/or allies instead.

name: Cursed Bullets
rules: Godfrey deals 5 shadow damage to each Raiding hero.;Level 3+: Then, Godfrey heals damage from himself equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavour: This is the quality of assassin sent to kill me? Laughable. - Lord Godfrey

name: Dangerous Gambit
rules: Godfrey deals 5 shadow damage to each Raiding hero unless its controller reveals the top card of his deck. Then, Godfrey deals 10 shadow damage to each Raider's hero whose controller revealed an ally this way.

name: Dark Archangel Form
rules: Attach this to the Dungeon ally with the highest printed [Health].;Ongoing: Attached ally has + 10 / + 10.
flavour: I grow tired of this hunt... Time to die! - Baron Ashbury

name: Dark Confusion
rules: The MARKED hero's controller rolls a die:;1-3: The MARKED hero deals 10 melee damage to each other Raiding hero.;4-5: Each other Raider discards three random cards.;6: Each other Raider draw a card.

name: Dark Influence
rules: Each Raiding ally deals shadow damage to itself equal to its ATK.

name: Gargoyles
rules: For each Raider who controls no ready resources, put a 5 [Melee] / 5 [Health] Gargoyle ally token into play with Ferocity.

name: Heroic Sacrifice
rules: Raiders choose one: Godfrey deals 4 melee damage to each Raiding hero and ally; or the Raiders choose a Raider, and Godfrey deals 8 melee damage to each hero and ally he controls.

name: Intruders in the Keep! To Arms!
rules: Reveal the top two cards of the Dungeon deck. Put each revealed ally into play and the rest on the bottom of the Dungeon deck.

name: Kill Them All
rules: Godfrey deals 4 shadow damage to each Raiding hero and ally and 4 shadow damage to each Dungeon ally.

name: Our Vigilance Is Eternal...
rules: Put the top five cards of the Dungeon deck into the graveyard, then put a random ally from the Dungeon graveyard into play with this ability attached to it.;Ongoing: If attached ally would deal damage, it deals double that mush instead.;When this ability leaves play, destroy attahed ally.

name: Pain and Suffering
rules: The Raiders choose and discard seven total cards between them. If they don't have seven cards, they choose and destroy seven Raiding cards instead.

name: Pistol Barrage
rules: Godfrey deals 1 shadow damage to each Raiding hero or ally, plus an additional 1 for each Pistol Barrage in the Dungeon graveyard.

name: Protect Lord Godfrey!
rules: Reveal cards from the top of the Dungeon deck until you reveal a Boss ally. Put that ally into play and the rest on the bottom.

name: Stay of Execution
rules: Each Raider destroys an ally he controls.;Ongoing: 7 -> Destroy this ability. Any Raider may use this power.;When this ability is destroyed, each Raider may put an ally from his graveyard into play under his control.

name: Sudden Attack
rules: Ongoing: When a Dungeon ally enters play, destroy this ability. If you do, Dungeon allies have +5 ATK and Ferocity this turn.

name: Toxic Coagulant
rules: Each Raider discards two random cards. Then, each Raider may choose a card in his graveyard and put it into his hand.

name: Word of Shame
rules: Each Raider chooses and destroys an ability, ally, and equipment he controls.

name: Your Journey Ends in Agony!
rules: The MARKED hero's controller puts the top seven cards of his deck into his graveyard. If he put three or more allies into his graveyard this way, destroy all Raiding allies.

name: Godfrey's Belt
rules: This armor exhausts to prevent the first damage Godfrey would be dealt each turn.;When this armor enters play, Godfrey has +5 ATK this turn for each equipment in his party (including this).

name: Godfrey's Britches
rules: This armor exhaust to prevent the first damage Godfrey would be dealt.;When this armor enters play, Godfrey heals 5 damage from himself for each equipment in his party (including this).

name: Godfrey's Crystal Scope
rules: When Godfrey deals combat damage to a Raiding hero, he also deals that much damage to each other Raiding hero.;Level 3+: When this item entrs play, Godfrey has Stealth this turn.

name: Godfrey's Pistols
rules: Godfrey strikes with this weapon the first time he attacks each turn.;Level 3+: When this weapon enters play, ready Godfrey when he attacks for the first time this turn.

name: Be Vewy Vewy Quiet!
rules: Flip the Gargoyles ability without putting any Gargoyle tokens into play.;Reward: 3 XP

name: Completion Machine
rules: A Raider controls at least eight face-down resources.;Reward: 3 XP

name: Haunted Keep
rules: There are three or more Bloodthirsty Ghouls in the Dungeon graveyard.;Reward: 3 XP

name: Not a Scratch on Me!
rules: Destroy the Dungeon hero with at least one Raiding hero at full health.;Reward: 3 XP

name: Pantsing
rules: Destroy Godfrey's Britches or Godfrey's Belt.;Reward: 3 XP

name: Pro Move
rules: A Raiding hero has 1 remaining [Health] during a Dungeon turn but isn't destroyed.;Reward: 3 XP
